ui.graphical

Class Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.graphical.Cell

  •  class Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    Graphical - Cell
    Encapsulates the creation of the hexagonal terrains of the map.
    Author:
    Karina Suemi, Renato Cordeiro Ferreira, Vinicius Silva
    See Also:
    Panel

    • Constructor Detail

      • Cell

        Cell(Player player,
    int x,
    int y,
    int r,
    Terrain terrain)
        Default constructor.
        Parameters:
        player - Player who is visualizing the cell (for his specific view)
        x - Horizontal position where the cell center will be set
        y - Vertical position whee the cell center will be set
        r - Hexagon radius
        terrain - Terrain to build the cell

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        void draw(java.awt.Graphics g)
        Add the texture to the cell, using an image inside a rectangle with dimensions 32x32.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphic object with all context needed to render the image

      • insertScenario

        Insert a scenario if there is one in the terrain of the cell.
